name: WeatherLink
0:
”Alexa, ask WeatherLink what are the current conditions”
”Alexa, ask WeatherLink to get the current conditions”
”Alexa, open WeatherLink”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weather link
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask WeatherLink for the current weather conditions from any of your Davis Instruments personal weather stations.

Current weather conditions include: 
• Outside temperature
• Humidity
• Wind conditions, speed and direction
• Rainfall amount since midnight
• Barometric pressure and trend
• Current rain rate
